name: Lena Lang
description: Lena Lang is a Canadian business English teacher and communication coach. She helps busy professionals show up confidently in meetings, deliver impactful presentations, and write well-crafted emails so they can build great relationships with their English speaking team members and clients.

name: Evelyn Gastanes
description: Evelyn Gastanes started teaching as a speech therapist for special needs children. Today along with being a speech therapist she is an online teacher. She has been teaching English online for more than 6 years now for students living in Hongkong, Japan, Korea, the UK, Vietnam and China.

name: Romeo Notario
description: Romeo Notario holds a graduate degree in fine arts and education and also has his teaching certification to teach English as a Foreign Language (TEFL). He has been teaching online for 13 years. Before that he taught some years at the university level. He specializes in business English and grammar classes.
